title: Upcoming Verde Valley Sports Schedule
text: Upcoming Verde Valley Sports Schedule October 27- Mingus Swim at Bradshaw Mountain, 4 p.m. October 27- Mingus Girls Volleyball vs Northwest Christian, 6 p.m.October 27- Camp Verde Girls Volleyball at Grand Canyon, 3 p.m. October 29- Camp Verde Girls Volleyball vs Joy Christian SchoolOctober 29- Mingus Volleyball at Barry Goldwater October 29- (State Playoffs) Camp Verde Girls Soccer at Round Valley, 6 p.m. October 29- (State Playoffs) Camp Verde Boys Soccer at Phoenix Country Day, 4 p.m. October 30- Camp Verde Football at Mohave Accelerated, 7 p.m. October 30- Mingus Football at Prescott, 7 p.m. October 31- Mingus Swim: San Tan Shadows Invite at Chandler • Shark Tank's Kiersten Hathcock talks on Intuition in Business (750 views) Article Comment Submission Form Comments are not posted immediately.
